content.title: 'Fortnite' fight：ラッパーがダンスを主張することはできますか？ - ワシントンポスト
content.desc: Rapper 2Milly, above, is suing the makers of the video game “Fortnite.”2015 Randy Shropshire In a world of GIFs and memes, most of us are accustomed to processing instantly the tiniest snip of human movement. We can decipher what it means, who’s doing it and how cool it is. We see swiveling legs on YouTube, we think: Beyoncé. Crossed wrists and a wide-legged gallop with the backfield in motion: Korean pop star Psy. Interpreting even the most fragmented body language on digital platforms is a 21st-century skill, largely honed through social media. [The dances in “Fortnite” have become nearly...

content.title: 7つの季節で、「Fortnite」は1つのTier-100スキンを持っていませんでした -  Forbes
content.desc: Fortnite We got our first look Fortnite: Battle Royale’s Season 7 battle pass yesterday. The start of a new season is Christmas morning for the ultra-popular battle royale title, with massive map changes, new items, new challenges and a whole new battle pass stacked with skins and other cosmetics ready for players to unlock once they’ve paid out $10. The batttle pass is the primary organizing principle of the game, and that’s why the leadup is so exciting every time: every season Fortnite players race to unlock the ultimate achievement: a Tier-100 battle pass and the elite skin that comes w...

content.title: ハッカーたちはますます2019年に若いビデオゲームプレイヤーをターゲットにしているという新しい報告がある -  Quartz
content.desc: In the online gaming world, it’s normal to play with or against strangers—and this is presenting an increasingly important security threat as the value of the industry grows. A new forecast report by Experian, the credit and identity theft protection firm, predicts that video-game data breaches will be a major issue in 2019. Cybercriminals can “easily pose as a gamer, build trust within a particular game or community, and gain access to privileged inside information,” the report said. This includes obtaining personal information like full names and phone numbers, as well as passwords and cr...

content.title: Fort NiteのビデオゲームStar Ninjaがアルバムを落とし、未来への一望 -  Forbes
content.desc: Justin Caruso (l.) and Ninja (Tyler Blevins) in Capitol Records Studio A Seventy feet from Nat King Cole’s piano, with Frank Sinatra’s microphones nearby, in Capitol Records’ historic Hollywood recording studios, a lanky guy with spiky aqua hair plays the world’s most popular video game alongside a string of musicians. It’s a decided change from the usual reasons people load thousands of dollars worth of expensive gear into Studio A, where countless musical stars have recorded hit records for decades. This Sunday night, it’s about Capitol, a division of Universal Music Group, trying to rema...

content.title: Fortniteが支配するようにビデオゲームの株式が崩壊 -  CNN
content.desc: Fortnite and other so-called multiplayer battle royale games are all the rage. And investors in leading video game companies have been stuck doing the "take the L" Fortnite loser dance as a result. Shares of Activision Blizzard (ATVI) have plunged nearly 45% in the past two months. Electronic Arts (EA) is down almost 30%. And Take-Two Interactive (TTWO) has plummeted 25%, despite having a successful new game -- Red Dead Redemption 2. Fortnite may be stealing away some gamers thanks to the fact that it can be downloaded for free on iPhones and iPads, Android phones and tablets as well as pop...

content.title: 'Fortnite' Season 7のブロックとは何ですか？ - 国際ビジネスタイムズ
content.source_nm: 国際ビジネスタイムズ
content.desc: Epic Games announced during The Game Awards that it has removed Risky Reels from the “Fortnite” battle royale map. In its place is a new location called The Block that will feature the most interesting islands built by players in the recently launched Creative mode. Yesterday, Epic Games launched season 7 of “Fortnite” and brought some huge changes to the battle royale map. There is now a snowy biome with new named locations scattered throughout the area. The arrival of season 7 also brought along a new Creative mode, which allows players to create their very own island designs where they c...

content.title: 今年のYouTubeリワインドには、YouTube（そしてFortnite）で有名にならなかった人々がたくさんいます。The Washington Post
content.desc: Creators pause while shooting Rewind, the annual look back at the past year in YouTube culture. (YouTube)YouTube YouTube Rewind is an annual online cultural tradition at this point: a video that looks back at the past year on the platform, released and promoted by YouTube as part of its year in review. It is, in many ways, a glimpse into how YouTube as a company sees the culture that lives within it. So it is telling that this year’s “rewind” opens with, and heavily features, Will Smith. Yes, the actor. Smith has become a pretty big presence on the sitethis year, posting slickly produced vi...

content.title: フォルナイトは黒人アーティストからのダンス・ムーブメントを充当するために訴えられています - クォーツ
content.desc: Rapper 2 Milly is suing Epic Games, the makers of Fortnite, for allegedly using and profiting from, without permission, a dance move he created. The dance move in question is the “Milly Rock,” which 2 Milly—whose real name is Terence Ferguson—popularized in a music video on YouTube in 2014. The move has since been widely recreated, even by celebrities like Rihanna and the Manchester United soccer team, and in July 2018, a Fortnite emote imitating the dance called “Swipe It” became available. (Emotes are lifelike actions that players’ avatars can carry out.) This, my fam, is the Milly Rock, ...

content.title: Fortnite Season 7の開始時間とダウンタイムは、新しい飛行機でのリリースヒントとして確認されています - これまでに知っていることすべて -  The Telegraph
content.desc: With Season 6 of Fortnite coming to its conclusion, Epic Games has confirmed the arrival of Fortnite Season 7 today. The developer has confirmed that Fortnite will go down at 9am UK time (4am ET) on 6 December as the new season is implemented. The downtime will likely last a few hour as the new Battle Pass, skins and features are added to the hit game. Patch notes detailing the changes and a new trailer will likely be released as the game updates. Epic first starting teasing the new season at the start of this week, with a tweet from the official Fortnite Twitter account that featured an im...

content.title: 'Fortnite：Battle Royale'：シーズン7の勝利の傘 - フォーブス
content.desc: Fortnite Cast your eyes on the grandest of treasures Fortnite has to offer, and know that you may never get a chance to hold it. Season 7 just launched in Fortnite: Battle Royale, and with it a whole new suite of challenges to quest after. There’s the Tier-100 Ice King, of course, as well as the long-term “Snowfall” skin that asks players to complete ten weeks of challenges. Those are hard but doable: even less-talented players like myself can grab them with a little grit and verve. There’s one in there that no amount of grind will get for you, however. Every season comes with its own victo...

content.title: Xboxは、子供たちが他の人とFortniteをどのように使っているかを保護するのに役立つ -  Quartz
content.desc: Xbox has new family settings that lets parents control whether or not their children interact with players from other networks. In a blog post today (Dec. 6), Dan McCulloch, general manager for Xbox Live, the Microsoft gaming system, said that Fortnite is the first game to have these new features, which are available now. “This includes two new settings parents can turn on or off, which empowers them to allow or block both cross-network play and cross-network communication, on their child’s account,” McCulloch writes. Xbox is the first console to offer such options. “Cross-network” play or ...

content.title: 'Fortnite' Challenge Guide：7つの異なる場所で踊る場所 - フォーブス
content.desc: Fortnite It’s time for a brand-new Season of weekly Challenges! Season 7 is here in Fortnite:Battle Royale, and with it a chance to start all over again levelling up the battle pass, completing challenges and making your way all the way to the Ice King skin that sits menacingly atop the heap. The best way to do this, as always, is with weekly challenges. Some of these sare straightforward, and some of these are less so. We’re here to help with the straightforward ones, starting with dancing in different forbidden locations. This is actually a repeat from way back in Season 3, and these sign...

content.title: ここでは、フォークナイトのシーズン7パッチ - フォーブスで見つかったすべての漏れたスキンと化粧品があります
content.desc: Here are all the new skins and cosmetics found in the Season 7 patch. Today is a big day for Fortnite players. Season 7 kicked off earlier this morning, and with it we now have a bunch of leaked skins, gliders, back bling and other cosmetics slowly trickling out. You can see all the skins included in the Season 7 Battle Pass here. In the meantime, let’s take a look at the various skins/outfits and cosmetics that dataminers have uncovered since this morning’s v7.0 patch went live. Outfits Naturally the first leaked skins are pilot-themed. That makes sense given the inclusion of a new Named A...

content.title: 'Fortnite：Battle Royale'  - フォーブスの新シーズン7バトルパススキンはここにあります
content.desc: Check out the new skins in Fortnite’s Season 7 Battle Pass. Fortnite: Battle Royale Season 7 is almost upon us, and with it major changes to the game’s huge map including a brand new ice biome. We already have the crazy new patch notes which you can read here, and you can watch the festive new cinematic trailer here. And check out the rest of the Battle Pass for Season 7 here. And now that the servers are back up, we have the full cadre of Season 7 Battle Pass skins—four of which are “progressive” meaning they have special unlocks that add customization options as you progress. So let’s tak...

content.title: 'Fortnite'のチャレンジ：RVの王冠の上でダンスする場所（ステージ1） - フォーブス
content.desc: Fortnite A new season of Fortnite is here, and with it comes a number of new challenges. One of the most significant ones released here in a week 1 is a progressive challenge that tasks players with three objectives. The first of which is to dance on top of a crown of RVs. I genuinely could not think of where this was, as I thought that it might be a new addition to the map which arrived with the iceberg, but that isn’t the case. Rather the crown of RVs is actually on the desert on one of the mesas at the very south the map. Here’s where that is on the map. It’s the mesa right above the lit...
